newsitem.title: USA: Meteor Industries closes plant financing.
newsitem.headline: Meteor Industries closes plant financing.

text.p: Meteor Industries Inc said Thursday it completed about $150 million of debt and equity financing for a 125 megawatt power plant in Pakistan.
The company, which was an initial shareholder in the project through a subsidiary, said it agreed to retain a 1.5 percent interest in the plant in exchange for about $685,000 it invested in it.
It will not have the right to acquire any further interest in the plant or be obliged to make additional investments.
The company added that it obtained the right until February 28, 1998 to sell its interest to a third party linked to one of the other partners for about the amount of its investment.
